arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Hjulmand targeting winning start
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will begin life under Kasper Hjulmand when they welcome Eintracht Frankfurt to the BayArena on Friday.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt’s Jonathan Burkardt deemed fit enough to start against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt head coach Dino Toppmöller remained in an optimistic mood at his Thursday pre-match press conference.

Bayer Leverkusen made the bold decision to sack Erik ten Hag just two games into the Bundesliga season following a 3-3 draw against a 10-man Werder Bremen side in gameweek two. Kasper Hjulmand is the ...

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt welcome Kaua Santos and Burkardt back for Leverkusen clash
arts.sum: Kaua Santos and Jonathan Burkardt will be back in Eintracht Frankfurt's squad for their Friday night game against Bayer Leverkusen.
